data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.

variations.name: Archery Range
variations.description: Produces ranged infantry units.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产远程步兵单位。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.

data.name: Blacksmith
data.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.

variations.name: Blacksmith
variations.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers and Scouts. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Capital Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers and Scouts. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民和侦察兵。驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
首都城镇中心可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.

data.name: Deer Stones
data.description:
Deer Stones grant access to the Khan's Hunter at the Archery Range.
Instantly researches the Yam Network technology.

variations.name: Deer Stones
variations.description:
Deer Stones grant access to the Khan's Hunter at the Archery Range.
Instantly researches the Yam Network technology.
variations.descriptionCN:
有了鹿石，可以在靶场获得汗的猎人。
立即研究驿站网络科技。

data.name: Dock
data.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.

variations.name: Dock
variations.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产海军单位。
自动修理附近受损的海军单位。
最多可容纳三艘渔船。

data.name: Ger
data.description:
Villagers can drop off Food, Wood, and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve resource gathering.
Stone is gathered through Ovoos.

variations.name: Ger
variations.description:
Villagers can drop off Food, Wood, and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve resource gathering.
Stone is gathered through Ovoos.
variations.descriptionCN:
村民可将食物、木材和黄金存放于此建筑。可研究提升资源采集效率的科技。
石料可通过敖包来采集。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Researches have improved effect.

data.name: Khaganate Palace
data.description: Automatically spawns diverse armies from across the Mongol Empire and its dominions.

variations.name: Khaganate Palace
variations.description: Automatically spawns diverse armies from across the Mongol Empire and its dominions.
variations.descriptionCN: 自动生成来自蒙古帝国及其领地的各种军队。

data.name: Kurultai
data.description: Nearby units within its aura heal +1 health every 1 second and gain an additional +20% damage.

variations.name: Kurultai
variations.description: Nearby units within its aura heal +1 health every 1 second and gain an additional +20% damage.
variations.descriptionCN: 其光环内的附近单位每 1 秒治疗 +1 生命值，并获得额外 +20% 伤害。

data.name: Monument of the Great Khan
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Monument of the Great Khan
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
variations.descriptionCN: 建造并守护世界奇观可以获得胜利。敌方文明会察觉并设法摧毁你的世界奇观。

data.name: Outpost
data.description:
Light garrison and defensible position.
Extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises.
Can be upgraded with weaponry.
Yam: Increases the speed of nearby Cavalry and Traders.

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description:
Light garrison and defensible position.
Extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises.
Can be upgraded with weaponry.
Yam: Increases the speed of nearby Cavalry and Traders.
variations.descriptionCN:
简单的驻军及防守位置。
视野开阔，可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。
可升级武器。
驿站：提升附近骑兵和商人的速度。

data.name: Ovoo
data.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 70/100/120/150 Stone per minute by Age. Houses unique Mongol technologies.
Constructing a new Ovoo will destroy the prior one.

variations.name: Ovoo
variations.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 70/100/120/150 Stone per minute by Age. Houses unique Mongol technologies.
Constructing a new Ovoo will destroy the prior one.
variations.descriptionCN:
必须建在石料露头上。
随着时代提升，每分钟采集 70/100/120/150 石料。可研究独特蒙古科技。
建造新敖包会摧毁旧有的敖包。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
- Researches have improved effect.
- Pastures produce sheep faster.

data.name: Pasture
data.description: Automatically produces a gatherable Sheep every 140 seconds. Will eventually stop producing if too many Sheep are produced and not gathered.

variations.name: Pasture
variations.description: Automatically produces a gatherable Sheep every 140 seconds. Will eventually stop producing if too many Sheep are produced and not gathered.
variations.descriptionCN: 每 140 秒自动生产一只可收集的绵羊。如果生产的绵羊太多且没有被收集，则生产将停止。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Pastures produce sheep faster.

data.name: Prayer Tent
data.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

variations.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产宗教单位并可研究宗教科技。从城堡时代 (第三时代) 开始，宗教单位可拾取圣物并将其放置在此建筑中以产生黄金。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
- Researches have improved effect.

data.name: The Silver Tree
data.description: Acts as a Market. Production speed of Traders increased by +40% with a -40% reduced Gold cost.

data.name: The White Stupa
data.description:
Acts as an Ovoo and produces 240 Stone per minute without a Stone Outcropping.
Decreases the Stone cost of double unit production by -50%.

variations.name: The White Stupa
variations.description:
Acts as an Ovoo and produces 240 Stone per minute without a Stone Outcropping.
Decreases the Stone cost of double unit production by -50%.
variations.descriptionCN:

双倍单位生产的石料成本 -50%。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
- Researches have improved effect.
- Pastures produce sheep faster.
